segments.text: How would your friends or colleagues describe you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( Pause a few seconds ) They say Mr . Chen is an honest , hardworking and responsible man who deeply cares for his family and friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What personality traits do you admire ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What leadership qualities did you develop as an administrative personnel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel that learning how to motivate people and to work together as a team will be the major goal of my leadership .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you normally handle criticism ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Silence is golden . Just don't say anything ; otherwise the situation could become worse . I do , however , accept constructive criticism .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you find frustrating in a work situation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes , the narrow-minded people make me frustrated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you handle your conflict with your colleagues in your work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will try to present my ideas in a more clear and civilized manner in order to get my points across .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To secure employment hopefully with your company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long would you like to stay with this company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will stay as long as I can continue to learn and to grow in my field .
segments.speaker: S1
